original: Moss, Thure Bjelke, major, Uddeval|la, f. 1/5/93 i Oxelösund, Söder-manl. 1, av dir. Olof Andersson o. Mina Möss. G. 34 m. Kerstin Waller. Barn : Anita f. 35, Viveca 36. — Stud:-ex. i Hälsingb. 13, off :ex. 15, vapen-off:kurs 19, KHS 25-27. Fänrik v. Bo-husl. reg. 15, löjtn. 18, kapt. 30, majoi’ 41. Reg:adjut. 27, komp:off. o. lär. v. stud :kulispr :komp. o. kulspr :underbe-fälssk. v. I. 8 28-30, andre lär. v. inf:-skjutsk. 33-34, reg :kvartermäst. samma tid, andre adjut. i Västra arméföird. stab 34-35, förste adjut. 36-39, stabs-clief sed. 41. RSO, Gbgs o. Boh. 1. skytteförb. GM, 2 SkytteM.
translated: Moss, Thure Bjelke, Major, Uddevalla, b. 1/5/93 in Oxelösund, Södermanland. Son of director Olof Andersson and Mina Möss. Married in 1934 to Kerstin Waller. Children: Anita b. 1935, Viveca b. 1936. Completed student exam in Hälsingborg in 1913, officer exam in 1915, weapons officer course in 1919. Attended the Royal Swedish Army Staff College from 1925-1927. Appointed ensign in the Bohuslän Regiment in 1915, lieutenant in 1918, captain in 1930, major in 1941. Served as regimental adjutant in 1927, company officer and instructor in basic rifle and machine gun courses at Infantry Combat School from 1928-1930, second instructor at the Infantry Shooting School from 1933-1934, regimental quartermaster during the same time, second adjutant in the Western Army Command Staff from 1934-1935, first adjutant from 1936-1939, and staff chief since 1941. Awarded the Royal Order of the Sword, Gothenburg and Bohus County Rifle Association Gold Medal, and the 2nd Infantry Regiment Gold Medal.

membership.name: Gothenburg and Bohus County Rifle Association
